title: Problems starting games
body:
Sometimes I can go directly into game after champ select
Sometimes it lags out after champ select and then I can reconnect after 1 re log in
Sometimes it takes closing and reopening the client a few times and re logging in 

This can only be a server problem because there are no connection issues in game

replies.body:
It's not uncommon for your network to be able to reach some servers like Google or Youtube, but unable to reach certain game servers like ours or Blizzards. This happens because of the way your ISP routes your connection sometimes, so let's take a look at that connection and it's health as it travels to our servers.

Grab a tool like [WinMTR](http://winmtr.net/winmtr-v0-92-now-available/) and run a trace to our NA servers at 104.160.131.1, then post what it says here so I can take a look.
